To walk in all the truth means being truthful in word and in deed, constantly developing in the graces of a Christian character. The essential unity of believers, as set forth in the Word of God, is to be a standard to which we must all earnestly strive to attain. Christ has given His people an 


                                    -194- 

example, that they need make no mistake. We must ever be watchful that we may imitate our Divine Pattern--Letter 344, 1906, p. 4. (To W. W. Simpson, October 27, 1906.)
